title: Nine Perfect Strangers
description: Could ten days at a health resort really change you forever? Nine perfect strangers are about to find out...The eagerly-anticipated new novel from the worldwide Number One bestselling author behind Emmy-award-winning HBO series Big Little Lies and smash-hit novel The Husband's SecretPraise for Liane Moriarty:'One of the few writers I'll drop anything for' Jojo Moyes'Staggeringly brilliant' Sophie Hannah'Fascinating and compassionate' Daily Telegraph
author: Liane Moriarty
